extendedInfo.description: Simply beautiful live wallpaper inspired by the default Nexus Live Wallpaper. Create your very own unique live wallpaper with tons of customization to play with.â Background âMake your own background combination with setting for:- Background color- Background gradient mode (solid, linear gradient, linear gradient flip, radial gradient and aurora)- Background pattern (13 available for now)- Background pattern color and opacity- Dynamic color mode for aurora gradientâ Custom Background âAside from 13 background pattern we provide, you can also pick an image from your gallery to be the background pattern for your Next Nexus Live Wallpaperâ Particle âThere are 3 types of particles group  on this live wallpaper: - General particles which is the particles that moving and animating around the screen, - Touch particles which is appear when you touch the screen- Glitter particles which is appear when you swipe across the screen. â General Particles âThere are 3 general particles group. You can control pretty much everything about these particles, both appearance and animation style. For general particles, each of particles group, you can customize: - Amount of the particles- Color of the particles (one color or mixed color) + support custom color- Overall Size- Head Type (square, triangle, star, circle, hexagon, shuriken)- Head Opacity- Tail Opacity- Tail Length- Glow Opacity- Glow Size- Animation style (moving, growing, grow and move)- Growing position (random, center point, nine points, circle, heart shape, bio-hazard, X symbol, etc)- Growing speed- Duration- Moving direction (Down, Up, Left, Right, Vertical, Horizontal, Mixed)- Rotation mode (Mixed, Clockwise, Counter Clockwise, No Rotation)- Rotation speedâ 40 Themes âWith so many setting, you probably wondering what combination is the best. Don't worry, we have pick up 40 different, unique, and beautiful combination as a "Themes" in the setting. You should check them up  :) â User Custom Themes âGot a awesome setting combination? Don't worry. You can save it as user custom theme. You have unlimited slot for saving custom theme.â Custom Setting Code âWant to share you setting? Go to custom setting code, and copy your unique setting code. Share it wherever you want. User who have the code can simply paste and apply it to his/her Next Nexus Live Wallpaper PRO. You can also share your setting with screenshot plus QR code. We set up a fan page on Facebook so user can share to each other their awesome next nexus live wallpaper custom setting.Link: https://www.facebook.com/NextNexusLiveWallpaperâ Other Features â- Screenshot (with QR Code)- Smooth animation- Portrait and landscape support- Tablet support- MoveToSD support- Touch interactivity- Future update for more pattern and more themesIf you like cool nexus style wallpaper, then this would be the best Nexus live wallpaper for you =)To open and setting up your live wallpaper: Home-> Press menu-> wallpapers-> Live Wallpapers.

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: Very nice live wallpaper :) I love how much you can customise it
reviews.author: Simon Davies

reviews.title: Great Dev!
reviews.comment: Every once in a while I\'ll get a \"burst\" effect when touching the screen when glitter is selected...any chance of that being permanent? GREAT WORK GUYS! THANK YOU!!! What else ya got up your sleeve?\360\237\221\215\360\237\221\214\360\237\221\217
reviews.author: patrick cottingham

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Really nice and dont take much battery
reviews.author: Simon Dang

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love how this looks and it makes my phone feel good.  :-)
reviews.author: Glenn Jenkins

reviews.title: Love it, just has one thing missing.
reviews.comment: I tried the free version and decided to buy the pro because this is by far one of the best nexus laser lap yet. There is just one thing I didn\'t like that all the others have....in this you can only choose 3 custom colors. I own nothing but nexus devices and like keeping the lasers Google colors. Add the 4th custom color and I\'ll up it to 5 stars. Other than that its an outstanding app.
reviews.author: Timothy Horne

reviews.title: What a beauty...
reviews.comment: I have no doubt when I say that this is the best LWP on play store. Superb customizations, great customer support from the Dev.
reviews.author: Aniket Khandekar

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: Super smoothe and with a lot of customizations! Just pleasant, interesting and fun. I highly recommend!!
reviews.author: Marilyn C.

reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Ooh out of no where, a late night purchase of this lwp & we have a REAL TIGHT RACE, to my top #1 favorite lwp!!!! This brand new fabulous lwp is sprinting right toward the top position in my collection of an  estimated 200 lwp\'s. I recommend every1 purchase the pro version. Worth every single cent, + $! Only thing I would ask this very talented developer is, I would love 2 c some more colors 4  backgrounds. Such as gold, silver, platinum copper, bronze. Love this lwp!!!!
reviews.author: Constance Woerner

reviews.title: Thank you!!
reviews.comment: Tons of costumization for one live wallpaper. Will not get bored.
